app.title: Metis UI - A React component library based on Tailwind CSS
app.description: A React UI component library based on the Tailwind CSS design system for developing enterprise-level middle and back-end products.
app.banner.title: A Modern React-Tailwind Component Library for Developers.
app.banner.desc: Experience the power of Ant Design's comprehensive component library combined with the flexibility and utility-first approach of Tailwind CSS. Build modern, scalable, and visually stunning user interfaces effortlessly.
app.docs.components.icon.search.placehol: Search icons here, click icon to copy code
